job_description: TO APPLY:1. Apply on company website: https://www.airbnb.ca/jobs/departments/position/2492?locale=en2. Check off Applied in PlacePro Duration: 4 monthsLocation: San Francisco, United StatesWhy are Software Engineering Interns important at Airbnb?There is much more that we want to build and so much that we could improve. We value strong engineering interns who are agile enough to jump into most projects.What are examples of work that Software Engineering Interns have done at Airbnb?• Built a machine learning system to better detect chargeback fraud• Built a RabbitMQ-based pub/sub system to allow for an improved service oriented architecture• Built an API based cheft testing cluster that can easily be integrated into our jenkins system• Implemented ranking experiments to optimize the conversion flow
job_requirements: The following are some examples exp erience that is relevant to us:• Strong CS fundamentals gained through current pursuit of Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in computer science, math or related discipline• Experience using Java, Scala, Ruby, and C++ for the backend• Experience using Ruby, HTML/CSS, and Javascript for the frontend (project dependent)Open To All Majors:No
